accessibility.extended: Which of the following accessibility will be available?
accessibility.hybrid_automatedCaptions: Automated captions, online access to hybrid services
accessibility.hybrid_liveCaptions: Live captions, online access to hybrid services
accessibility.inPerson_adaAll: ADA-compliant location for all in-person services
accessibility.inPerson_adaSome: ADA-compliant location for some in-person services
accessibility.note: If participants must request accessibility in advance, please add that detail in the 'Other' field.

addSuccessNotice: Thank you for your submission. Someone will review and approve it shortly or reach out as needed.

clergy.extended: List the clergy team below that will lead during the Yamim Noraim.

contactEmail.extended: Email address for contact person listed above

contactName.extended: Name of best contact person for communications from Rabbis for Ceasefire

denomination.extended: Is your congregation affiliated with a specific denomination or movement?

editNotice: Making edits will delist this congregation until an administrator can approve your changes.
editSuccessNotice: Thanks for the update! Someone will review and approve it shortly or reach out as needed.
exists: A congregation with this name already exists in this location

fit.clergyMember: A member of the clergy team is affiliated with Rabbis for Ceasefire
fit.extended: Why would your congregation be a good fit for Jews in the ceasefire movement? Please share additional reasons in the 'Other' field.

flag.extended: Does your congregation display an Israeli flag?
flag.note: If yes, we will note that in the listing of your congregation so that people can make an informed decision about where they attend.
flag.yes: An Israeli flag is displayed, but not on the bima
flag.yesBima: An Israeli flag is displayed on the bima

fit.multipleClergyMembers: Multiple members of the clergy team are affiliated with Rabbis for Ceasefire
fit.publicStatement: The congregation has made a public statement supporting permanent ceasefire

flavor.extended: In 50 words or less, describe the congregation and ritual 'flavor' that guests will experience.

health.extended: For in-person services, please briefly describe COVID health and masking protocols at your congregation, or link to congregational guidelines.

name: Name of Congregation

registration.extended: What kind of registration do you offer to guests?
registration.fixedPrice: Fixed ticket price (per service or for all)

security.extended: Does your congregation have a police presence or other armed security?

services.extended: What types of services are non-members invited to join?
